text: @joncoopertweets I would rather have a COVID19 enema than work in the Trump White House. Must be liken to Nanites eating your brain slowly, you wouldn’t know you had been infected until one day you hear @realDonaldTrump speak and say “that makes sense” then it’s too late crazombie!
